short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The easiest way to find products in AliExpress that offer ePacket shipping!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When it comes to finding great AliExpress products that offer ePacket shipping…

…who has the time or patience to search AliExpress product-by-product to find the ones that do offer it?

Not us, and definitely not eCommerce business owners. 

That’s why we created this Chrome extension…

…so you no longer have to go through this tedious process, and you can instead use those hours and hours of saved time to work on your business!

It’s as easy to use as 1, 2, 3:

1. Download and this extension
2. Run A Product Search On AliExpress
3. Every Product That Offers ePacket Shipping Is Highlighted For Quick Discovery

That’s it! 

And unlike other extensions that may charge you for different search options… 

…This app is completely free to use from start to finish.

If you’re doing any kind of dropshipping through AliExpress, here’s why you should install it today:

1. Find Products Right On The Search Page:
AliExpress doesn't show you the shipping methods available on the search results page so in order to find out what the product offers and how much it costs, you typically have to click through into each product and then click again on the shipping methods to see if ePacket is offered. Now, the products that offer ePacket Shipping are highlighted right on the search page with no extra clicks saving tons of time from clicking back and forth!

2. Pricing On Search Page:
Not all Shipping is equal. In fact, some vendors mark it up quite a bit so you won't notice. Now you can compare every product on a search page side by side. You'll have all the information in one easy view to make better choices about what vendor to use.

3. Availability Per Country:
ePacket is offered in more countries than just the US. Just select the countries that you are interested in and we'll show you whether this shipping method is available in that country or not.  

4. Filter Out Products
If you are not interested in products that don't offer ePacket, select the option to hide those products so you can focus on the products that work for you.

About this app:
This is a project from the team at Dropified. If you haven’t heard of Dropified, it is a platform packed with tools and features to run and automate an eCommerce business. Many of its features are focused on automating AliExpress so it is a perfect fit for anyone looking to save time and put their eCommerce business on autopilot.
